text: mEqvaina(gm)# samAqnAnA$M karOqtyathO# dEvalOqkAdEqva ma#nuShyalOqkE prati# tiShThatyaqyamiqha pra#thaqmO dhA#yi dhAqtRuBiqrityA#haq muKya#mEqvaina#M karOtyuqBAvA#mindrAgnI AhuqvaddhyAq ityAqhaujOq bala#mEqvAva# rundhEq &yaM tEq yOni#r Ruqtviyaq ityA#ha paqSavOq vai raqyiH paqSUnEqvAva# rundhE ShaqDBirupa#tiShThatEq ShaDvA - [  ] 26
